api_list.name: Manufacturers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forest-products-network.p.rapidapi.com/manufacturers.geojson"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forest-products-network.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
